title: Why was Diana's Q reverted without notice ?
body: on the patch notes it still says the q changes are in place but dont appear in game. And theres not mention of the revert on these boards or on the patch notes, what is going on?

replies.body: Shit was missed, most likely. Remember when Shen had a feature i his tooltips that took another year and a half for anyone to notice it was actually missing?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ml0ecgEK,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-09T20:59:32.959+0000)
>
> Shit was missed, most likely. Remember when Shen had a feature i his tooltips that took another year and a half for anyone to notice it was actually missing?

Azir supposedly had the HP scaling on his E shield missing since release. Took 3 years before anyone noticed since Rylais didnt provide a significant value on its own

> [{quoted}](name=Kazekiba,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ml0ecgEK,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-07-09T21:17:33.247+0000)
>
> Azir supposedly had the HP scaling on his E shield missing since release. Took 3 years before anyone noticed since Rylais didnt provide a significant value on its own
but if im pointing it out now they are bound to notice right?

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Diana,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ml0ecgEK,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2019-07-09T21:58:53.829+0000)
>
> but if im pointing it out now they are bound to notice right?

Given how often Riot seems to visit the boards these days?

One can hope, is probably what iÂ´d answer x)

>
> Shit was missed, most likely. Remember when Shen had a feature i his tooltips that took another year and a half for anyone to notice it was actually missing?

do you think they will fix it though?
Did....did you just say riot is gonna fix something. N Omegalul
